title: Stalking Willow
description: A trail of bitterness, a stalker, and a neighbor to die for. Whatâ€™s a girl to do?A young executive, who fled a high-profile life years before, now faces the return of the paparazzi and a psychotic stalker unleashed by the machinations of her mother.When faith is the one thing she no longer possesses, can she learn to trust God and the man she left behind to see her through the fight of her life?
author: Fay Lamb
